    • Method Detail

      • getLoopsValue

        public static int getLoopsValue(int defaultValue)
        Get "loops" option's value from input arguments. If this option is not specified in arguments, a specified default value shall be returned.
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - value to return when option is not specified in arguments.
        Returns:
        int value of "loops" option

      • getSleepTimeValue

        public static long getSleepTimeValue(long defaultValue)
        Get "sleeptime" option's value from input arguments. If this option is not specified in arguments, a specified default value shall be returned.
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - value to return when option is not specified in arguments.
        Returns:
        long value of "sleeptime" option

      • getThreadNumValue

        public static int getThreadNumValue(int defaultValue)
        Get "threadnum" option's value from input arguments. If this option is not specified in arguments, a specified default value shall be returned.
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - value to return when option is not specified in arguments.
        Returns:
        int value of "threadnum" option

      • getMonitorValue

        public static boolean getMonitorValue()
        Get "monitoroff" options value from input arguments. If this option is not specified in arguments, a default value (false) shall be returned.
        Returns:
        true if monitoroff option is set, false otherwise.

      • optionParse

        public static boolean optionParse(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parse input command line options.
        Parameters:
        args - input command line arguments
        Returns:
        true if options are parsed successfully; false otherwise.
